title: Exceptional New Home Values in Beaumont; Last Chance to Buy New at Pardee Homes' Woodmont
text: Exceptional New Home Values in Beaumont; Last Chance to Buy New at Pardee Homes' Woodmont Pardee Homes is now selling the final phase of homes at Woodmont, in the popular Sundance master planned community. Featuring five floorplans, with up to approximatley 3,681 square feet, pricing starts in the mid $300,000s. YouTube Video Woodmont features spacious living, plus Pardee's LivingSmart brand of standard & optional measures that boost energy-efficiency, save water & improve air quality. BEAUMONT, CA, October 23,   The final opportunity to buy a new home at Woodmont by Pardee Homes is here and the timing couldn't be better for motivated home shoppers. With pricing form the mid $300,000s and low HOA fees, these stylish one- and two-story homes have already become home to 70 Inland Empire families. Pardee Homes is now selling the final phase of homes at this popular Beaumont neighborhood located in master-planned Sundance where new homes, mature parks, nearby schools and convenient shopping are all at your doorstep. Families like the Oronas, formerly of Colton, found the versatile floorplans, especially their choice of Plan 4 with Pardee's exclusive GenSmart Suite , a fantastic opportunity. "A few days after looking and then getting approved for a VA loan, we went for it," said Mark Orona. "We were blown away by the GenSmart Suite at Woodmont, and knew this would be the perfect place for us and our special needs son who could live in this versatile space, providing him with a home of his own within our home. To top it off, the Pardee team made us feel like family and everything about this home buying experience was so smooth from start to finish." Woodmont features a total of five floor plans (three homes are modeled), all with great room living, spacious master bedroom suites and gourmet kitchens with large kitchen islands. Homes at Woodmont range in size from approximately 2,385 to 3,681 square feet with up to five bedrooms, three to four baths, and three-bay garages. Each of the two-story plans has a downstairs bedroom with available 12-foot glider window package at the covered patio (on select plans). The exciting GenSmart Suite was designed to meet the needs of families who have a need for more versatile space and self-contained livability. The GenSmart Suite is a home within a home that provides privacy by offering a separate entry, living, sleeping, storage and kitchenette areas, and is ideal for guests, adult children or multi-generational family members. Woodmont also includes Pardee's exclusive LivingSmart brand with standard and optional measures that boost energy-efficiency, save water, improve indoor air quality and encourage material conservation and the use of recycled or sustainable resources. "Woodmont features spacious floor plans and today's most wanted features," said Matt Sauls, vice president of marketing and product development for Pardee Homes. "Savvy home shoppers are invited to act now to buy at Woodmont where there are just 10 homes remaining. Among the available homes is a Plan 2AR (Homesite 60) with four bedrooms plus den, three baths and a three-bay garage. This beautiful home, priced at $387,335, has approximately 3,246 square feet and includes a bonus room, loft, outdoor room, upgraded flooring, stylish black and white granite kitchen countertops and solar. This home is projected to be completed in early November." As part of the thriving master-planned community of Sundance , homeowners at Woodmont enjoy walkable, tree-lined parkways and two expansive neighborhood parks. There are also two elementary schools within the community. The city of Beaumont offers residents plenty of convenient shopping, services and easy access to Palm Springs, the San Bernardino Mountains and major business centers in San Bernardino and northwestern Riverside County. Nearby golf courses and mountain vistas add to the charm of this city with a rich past and an exciting future. For more information about Woodmont by Pardee Homes, call (951) 264-0127 or visit www.pardeehomes.com . The sales office and model homes are located at 1391 Tulip Circle South in Beaumont. From I-10, exit at Highland Springs Avenue and head north.
